item.title: Rep Jasmine Crockett refuses to apologize for 'Gov Hot Wheels' comment
item.description: Rep. Jasmine Crockett stormed away from an interview with Fox News after being asked about calling Gov. Greg Abbott "Governor Hot Wheels."

item.title: 'Veto Corleone': Youngkin kills left-wing dreams with record-setting bill nixing spree
item.description: Virginia Republican Gov. Glenn Youngkin set a record pace for vetoes in the last year of his term in Richmond.
